overview: Dapper Laughs is back!  Britain's most popular internet comedy sensation is back and causing more trouble than ever.  Despite continued criticism by the media, his profile and fan-base have continued to grow and now he's back, nothing is going to bring this star down!  DAPPER LAUGHS THE RES ERECTION LIVE is the sold out, stand-up live show and the official come-back event!
title: Dapper Laughs Live: The Res-Erection
